content.text:
# IBL Most Valuable Player Sonny Hendrawan Award

The Sonny Hendrawan Indonesian Basketball League (IBL) Local Most Valuable Player award is given to the most outstanding local player on a team's roster. The award was renamed, after Sonny Hendrawan, the only Indonesian that is inducted in the FIBA Hall of Fame.
Only one Naturalized player has won the award so far, with Jamarr Johnson being the last winner in 2021.
